category.name: Product Structure.Collaboration Context
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ALLOC_Source_Occurrence_Types
preference.preference_description: For use with allocation functionality. Specifies the components that can be used as source components for a given allocation type. Valid values are Allocation type::Source component type Where Allocation type is a valid Teamcenter allocation type, and Source component type is a valid Teamcenter object type used in a product structure.
